title: University of California Computing Services Conference: August 13-15, 2018
body: UCCSC is scheduled for August 13-15, 2018. Mark your calendar, tell your co-workers, write it on your Facebook wall... whatever. Just make sure you don't schedule anything else. You're gonna want to come to this.

title: UCCSC at UC Davis announcement posted to the UC IT blog
Sustainable Technology is the 2018 UCCSC theme
Happy 2018! Mark your calendars for UCCSC - August 13-15
Starting today, you can submit your UCCSC session proposal!
body:
Submittal deadline is March 23. 

The theme is “sustainable technology,” and organizers are calling for proposals that fit any of several tracks:

*   Health
*   Leadership/professional development
*   Research
*   Security/privacy
*   Technology and security policy
*   Web and applications
*   Women in technology

For more information and submission form, go to [https://uccsc.ucdavis.edu/submit-session-proposal](https://uccsc.ucdavis.edu/submit-session-proposal).

title: The Larry L. Sautter award application period is open until May 18
body:
The UC IT Leadership Council has called for applications for the 2018 Larry L. Sautter awards program recognizing technology projects that demonstrate the leadership council’s priorities, including innovation, collaboration and operational efficiency, and that advance UC’s teaching, research, health care and public service missions.

Eligibility extends to all faculty and staff — as teams or individuals — around the UC system, for project implementation in the last three years.

[_**More information is available on the awards program website.**_](https://www.ucop.edu/information-technology-services/initiatives/sautter-award-program/index.html)_ The application deadline is 5 p.m. Friday, May 18._

_An information and question-and-answer session will be held online, at noon Thursday, April 12, for people interested in submitting applications. _[_**Join by Zoom video conferencing**_](https://ucop.zoom.us/j/5109870638)_ or conference call: 408-638-0968 (Meeting ID 510-987-0638)._

title: UCCSC Session Proposal Deadline extended to April 2!
body: Nearly 100 session proposals have been created but we don’t want anyone to miss the opportunity to submit one. We’re extending the deadline to end of day, April 2.

title: Conference sessions finalized; presenters notified
body:
Presenters were notified today if their session(s) were accepted. If accepted, their registration will be comped. (_Please remember that if you're presenting with a team, only one person per session can claim the comped conference registration.)_

Presenters can log in to the site to view their accepted session(s) under My Sessions. While you're logged in, take a few minutes to update your profile with a photo and a short bio. You'll also be able to update and add to your session information.

You will be informed of the date, time, and location of your session once registration is closed in July.

title: Conference registration fee is $175
body:
**Conference Registration**

*   Conference registration fees are $175 (one session presenter per session is comped)
*   Registration opens for session presenters in one week - on May 18th
*   Registration opens for everyone on May 25

**UC IT Comped Attendees**

UCOP has generously offered to comp attendees that fit into the following categories. These will be listed on the registration form. Please note that up to 100 attendees in these categories will be comped but it is first-come, first-served.

*   Library IT
*   Research IT
*   First-time UCCSC attendees

title: Conference registration is now open!
body:
UCCSC registration opens for everyone today and remains open until July 3. Here’s the [registration form](/form/uccsc-2018-registration).

A few notes and reminders:

*   Registration is $175
*   If you’re a session presenter, one person per session can be comped.
*   Please add your bio and photo. We will publish a UCCSC 2018 attendee page.
*   Methods of payment include UC accounts and credit cards but only UC accounts can be used for campus housing.
*   Davis and vicinity hotels are listed on the [lodging page](https://uccsc.ucdavis.edu/lodging), including those offering special UCCSC rates.
*   Events and details will be added to the schedule. You can amend and add to your schedule as often as you want.

If you have any questions, please contact [uccsc2018-registration@ucdavis.edu](mailto:uccsc-registration@ucdavis.edu).

title: Update - most of the comped registrations claimed
body:
UCCSC registration opened for everyone on Friday, May 25. The comped registrations offered by UC IT were snapped up quickly by First-Time UCCSC attendees, and to a lesser degree by Library and Research IT staff. **The comped offer for First-Time attendees is now closed**. A few spots are open for Library and Research IT staff. If you fit into the latter categories, please register soon as that offer will close within a day or two, but keep in mind that Library and/or Research IT should be your primary function.  If you have any questions, please contact [uccsc2018-registration@ucdavis.edu](mailto:uccsc-registration@ucdavis.edu).

A few notes and reminders:

*   Registration is $175
*   If you’re a session presenter, only one person per session can be comped.
*   If you want to share your info, please upload your bio and photo. We will publish a UCCSC 2018 attendee page.
*   Methods of payment include UC accounts and credit cards but only UC accounts can be used for campus housing.
*   Davis and vicinity hotels are listed on the [lodging page](https://uccsc.ucdavis.edu/lodging), including those offering special UCCSC rates.
*   More events and details will be added to the schedule in the coming weeks. You can amend and add to your schedule as often as you want.

title: Closed as of June 1: Comped registrations for Library and Research IT and First Time Attendees
body:
UCCSC registration opened for everyone on Friday, May 25. As of June 1, the comped registrations offered by UC IT fo First-Time UCCSC attendees and Library and Research IT staff, is closed. If you have any questions, please contact [uccsc2018-registration@ucdavis.edu](mailto:uccsc-registration@ucdavis.edu).

A few notes and reminders:

*   Registration is $175
*   If you’re a session presenter, only one person per session can be comped.
*   If you want to share your info, please upload your bio and photo. We will publish a UCCSC 2018 attendee page.
*   Methods of payment include UC accounts and credit cards but only UC accounts can be used for campus housing.
*   Davis and vicinity hotels are listed on the [lodging page](https://uccsc.ucdavis.edu/lodging), including those offering special UCCSC rates.
*   More events and details will be added to the schedule in the coming weeks. You can amend and add to your schedule as often as you want.

title: UCCSC at UC Davis has sold out
body:
Due to overwhelming interest in the conference, we have reached capacity and registration is now closed.

Please email uccsc2018-registration@ucdavis.edu to be added to a wait list in case space becomes available.

title: UCCSC registration update
body:
Registration sold out very quickly! Over 500 people are now registered for UCCSC at UC Davis.

Here are some things to keep in mind: 

*   The wait list is first-come, first served.
*   Creating an account on the UCCSC website is not the same as registering for the conference.
*   If you selected a comped option, we are validating those, but if you received a automated response, you are currently on the registration list.
*   If you're a session presenter, UCCSC Ambassador, or a draft registrant, we are saving a spot for you. UCCSC Registration Chair, Jason Fearing, will send you the registration link so you can complete it no later than this Friday, June 15.
    
*   Note that if you paid with a campus recharge account, it takes longer to validate than paying by credit card. 
    
*   You will receive an individual email with further instructions, and if applicable, a user-specific registration link. The email will come from Jason Fearing (jfearing@ucdavis.edu). In the meantime, please send your inquiries to UCCSC2018-registration@ucdavis.edu.

title: UCCSC Registration is closed
body: Registration closed as of 5 p.m. on June 27th. There are 600+ attendees registered for the event. If you have any questions, email uccsc2018-registration@ucdavis.edu.
